extractAudio.title: Extract Audio from Video
extractAudio.description: Extract audio track from video files.
extractAudio.outputFormatDescription: Select the format for the audio to be extracted as.

toolInfo.title: What is {{title}}?
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to extract the audio track from video files. You can choose from different audio formats including AAC, MP3, and WAV.

extractAudio.title: Extract audio
extractAudio.shortDescription: Extract audio from video files (MP4, MOV, etc.) to AAC, MP3, or WAV.

changeSpeed.title: Change audio speed
changeSpeed.description: Change the playback speed of audio files. Speed up or slow down audio while maintaining pitch.
changeSpeed.shortDescription: Change the speed of audio files
changeSpeed.title: Change audio speed

mergeAudio.title: Merge Audio
mergeAudio.description: Combine multiple audio files into a single audio file by concatenating them in sequence.
mergeAudio.shortDescription: Merge multiple audio files into one (MP3, AAC, WAV).

trim.title: Trim Audio
trim.description: Cut and trim audio files to extract specific segments by specifying start and end times.
trim.shortDescription: Trim audio files to extract specific time segments (MP3, AAC, WAV).
